summary: This is a tutorial that I decided to make so people can swap rugs in their own mods. I know I had trouble with this at first so with these easy-to-follow steps, you should be making a bunch of changeable rugs in no time!
descriptionHtml:
[center][center][b][size=6][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][color=#ff0000][center][b][size=6][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][color=#c00000]Changeable Rugs Tutorial[/color][/font][/size][/b][/center][/color][/font][/size][/b][/center][/center][size=4]
This is a tutorial that I decided to make so people can swap rugs in their own mods. I know I had trouble with this at first so with these easy-to-follow steps, you should be making a bunch of changeable rugs in no time! 

[/size][size=4]
 - This tutorial is available in both PDF & Text File formats

Please contact me if you're having any trouble

~Zylice~ 

[font=Garamond][size=6][color=#4bacc6]*[url=http://zyliceliddell.weebly.com/#/]Visit Website For All Of My Mods & Resources![/url][/color][/size][/font]

[/size]
author: Zylice
